mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( seq, gubun, title, contents, reg_dt, reg_id ) VALUES ( #{seq}, #{gubun}, #{title}, #{contents}, SYSDATE, #{regId} )
mapper.select: SELECT seq, gubun, title, contents, reg_id, TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24MISS') reg_dt , answer_check FROM board WHERE seq = #{seq} ORDER BY seq
